availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Zachariah T. Laster (McLean County, Kentucky, carpenter )

body.p: McLean County, Kentucky, carpenter. North Carolina native. Son of Isaac Laster and Jane Laster. Married to Minerva A. Laster. Father of Mary L. Laster. Student in Surry County, North Carolina, in 1850. Carpenter in McLean County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, North Carolina, Surry County, South Division, p. 260A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McLean County, p. 123.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Illinois, Saline County, Township 8, Range 7, p. 481B.
